titles: Truth's integrity, or, A curious northern ditty called, Love will find out the way. To a pleasant new tune.
publisher: Printed for F, Coles, J.W. T. Vere, and W. Gilbertson,
notes: Place and date of publication taken from Wing (2nd ed.)
Right half-sheet contains: The second part, to the same tune.
Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow. Library.
